Gets the suffix of the model file from the sentence type

Parameters:

getModelName

public static java.lang.String getModelName(java.lang.String algorithm,
                                            java.lang.String suffix)
Gets the name of the model from the algorithm

Parameters:
algorithm - the name of the algorithm
suffix - the suffix of the file specifies if the model returned should be specific to biological sentences (biomed), clinical sentences (clinical), or both (both).
Returns:
the model that corresponds to the algorithm name

Gets the model to detect cue of the algorithm.

Parameters:
algorithm - the algorithm used
suffix - the suffix of the file specifies if the model returned should be specific to biological sentences (biomed), clinical sentences (clinical), or both (both).
Returns:
the model to detect hedge cue
